entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.4°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Periods of snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 1 except minus 3 south of Plum Point.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to rain near noon. Risk of freezing rain late in the morning. Snow south of Plum Point in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 1 except minus 3 south of Plum Point. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Rain or snow changing to periods of snow overnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 04 March 2023
